other_tests.findings: Chronic respiratory alkalosis with compensatory metabolic acidosis.

Mean pressure gradient of 9 mm Hg across the tricuspid valve; significant thickening of the bioprosthetic tricuspid valve leaflets with severely restricted leaflet motion; large mass of low echo density.
Confirmed a 9 mm Hg gradient consistent with severe tricuspid valve stenosis; arterial desaturation without left-to-right shunt.
Severe reduction in valve orifice area with a slit-like appearance; confirmed a significant right-to-left interatrial shunt through a large PFO.
Confirmed the shunt and showed significant tricuspid valve mass.
Suggested paradoxical embolism through the patent foramen ovale.
